greeting: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! Great to see you again. Remember me? I am Jibo.! I love coming to school and getting to play with you. <es name='affection_05' /> It makes me so happy that I want to dance! <es name='flamenco_strum_up_down_01' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> It's the robot that you selected last time </es>. We are ready to go to adventures together in the hills full of fruits this time!<es name='Emoji_Apple' />

all: <es cat='happy'> Okay, Today I'm going to make my favorite dish.</es> My favorite dish is an apple pie. But I don't have enough apples to make the pie. <es cat='sad' />
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different apples here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the hills.
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different apples here?</es><break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the hills.
c+g-: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many apples there are on the tree?</es><break size='0.5'/> Will you help me find different apples here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the hills.
c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many apples there are on the tree? </es> <break size='0.5'/> Will you help me find different apples here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the hills.

all: Do you remember all those <es cat='gift'> magical treasure boxes</es>? <break size='0.5' /> In each treasure box, we will find exactly what we are looking for,<break size='0.2' />if we can open it by solving a puzzle. <break size='0.5' /> There is also a puzzle <es name='Emoji_Question'> behind the question mark, but we cannot see it until we select it. <break size='0.5' />first we need to choose </es>which box to try to open. I will try first, but because I have no hands, I will <es name='Emoji_Brain'> use my brain power to move things on the screen!</es><break size='1.0/>
c-g-: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one.</es>
c-g+: <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, </es> because it looks challenging! <es cat='happy' />
c+g-: I wonder who made the treasure boxes. <break size='0.5'/><es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, because I can learn from it.</es>
c+g+: I wonder who made the treasure boxes. <break size='0.5'/><es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'>hmm.. <break size='1.0'/>I will choose this one, because it looks challenging </es>and I can learn a lot from it. <es cat='happy' />

tangram_tutorial: Oh, look! these puzzles are made of <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> pieces of different shapes. we need to find where to put them </es> to fill in the black area.  <break size='0.5'/>Like last time, we have two minutes to try, <es name='Emoji_Clock'> until the sand in the hourglass runs out, <break size='0.5'/>but we </es>need to try even faster so we are in time for the party! <break size='0.5' /> First, watch me and then you take a turn.

all: We found so many <prize-name>s. Yay! I can make a wonderful apple pie! <es name = 'affection_01'> Thank you for helping me <es name='SpinHead_01' />
<es name='Yawn_01' > I'm going to count the sheep and go back to sleep. Bye for now, but see you again soon! <break size='1.0' /> bye. </es>

question1: <es cat='question'> I wonder what makes the apples grow in different colors.</es>
question2: <es cat='confused'>I wonder why all the apples are round. Maybe there's an apple in the shape of a banana?</es>
question3: <es cat='question'>I'd like to know how many apples there are in the whole world!</es>
question4: <es cat='curious'>Hmm.. Shall I make the pie round? <break size='0.5'/>triangle? <break size='0.5'/>or square?</es>
question5: <es cat='question'>I wonder how many cakes I can make with all these apples? </es>
question6: <es cat='curious'>I wonder what's on the other side of the hill?</es>

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'>I wonder what the sheep on the opposite hill is doing?</es>
